name: PO - Material Master List (Cost Control)
query:
select
    po.name as purchase_order,
    po.transaction_date as po_date,
    poi.item_code,
    poi.item_name,
    poi.qty,
    poi.base_rate,
    poi.base_amount,
    po.supplier,
    po.project
from `tabPurchase Order` po
join `tabPurchase Order Item` poi on poi.parent = po.name
where po.docstatus = 1
  and (ifnull(%(project)s, '') = '' or po.project = %(project)s)
  and (ifnull(%(supplier)s, '') = '' or po.supplier = %(supplier)s)
  and (ifnull(%(item)s, '') = '' or poi.item_code = %(item)s)
  and (ifnull(%(from_date)s, '0000-00-00') = '0000-00-00' or po.transaction_date >= %(from_date)s)
  and (ifnull(%(to_date)s, '9999-12-31') = '9999-12-31' or po.transaction_date <= %(to_date)s)
order by po.transaction_date desc
